game_description: Catch Up is a casual virtual reality arcade game in which you play as a farmer, where the main goal is to catch eggs in a basket and not lose. The game has 4 modes with support for the rating system: • Infinity mode - the easiest mode where you can practice and get used to catching eggs; • Time mode - here your time is limited, so try to catch as many eggs as possible in the time you have; • Count mode - in this mode, the number of eggs is limited. Try to catch as many eggs as possible and not lose; • Sequence mode includes time mode and score mode, as well as a fun boss fight and his little helpers. Try catching right now!
review_2: So cute just wish for more without purchasing at least few more more levels but I had fun while it lasted
